meanings.sent1: Being foolhardy, he jumped off the cliff without checking the depth first.
meanings.sent2: It was foolhardy of her to drive without wearing a seatbelt.
meanings.sent3: The foolhardy squirrel thought it could outsmart the cat by running straight towards it.
meanings.sent4: His foolhardy decision to invest all his savings in a risky venture left him bankrupt.
meanings.sent5: The knight's foolhardy charge into battle without a plan led to his defeat.

meanings.definition: Foolishly adventurous or bold without thinking of the consequences
meanings.sent1: Their foolhardy expedition into the jungle without a guide was dangerous.
meanings.sent2: She made a foolhardy decision to quit her job without having another one lined up.
meanings.sent3: The foolhardy pirates thought they could take on the navy with just a rowboat.
meanings.sent4: His foolhardy attempt to impress her by climbing the tree ended in a fall.
meanings.sent5: The foolhardy explorer ventured into the cave without a flashlight, risking getting lost.
